text: Arau te'om yijani mahilara gharata achila, se'ijaniye te'omka kupraraocana dile arau duraarasamuha bandha karai dile, arau ka’le, ‘aha’. Te'om ka’le, ‘ma'i allahara asraya praarthana karao, niscaya te'om mora maniba; teraemi mora thakara sundara byarastha karaiche. Niscaya yalimasakala ketiya'o saphala nahaya’
